extendedInfo.description: Quick Launch â the ultimate custom lock screen launcher for all your quick access needs.â NEW! Add your social feeds to your lock screen: Facebook, Instagram and Twitter right on your lock screenâ NEW! Music player controls right on your lock screenâ iPhone style missed calls and notifications on your lock screenWith Quick Launch, you can perform useful tasks quickly and easily â directly from your phone's lock screen launcher!â Add your favorite widget (Google music, Facebook, Twitter, RSS reader, etc.) to your lock screenâ Add your personal social feeds: Facebook, Instagram and Twitter to your lock screen â Facebook Share and like, Instagram comment and like , Twitter reply and re-tweet all from your lock screenâ One click to launch any of your recently used apps such as Facebook, Browser, SMS appâ One click to display and call your recent contacts â View your missed calls and unread messages - iPhone styleâ Tap to Search provides direct access to installed apps, contacts, and any online information or sitesâ One click to access your camera and take photosâ One click control of your phone's ringer settingsâ Change your wallpaper to any image of your choosing â Unlock your phone as you normally wouldâ Download Quick Launch and get started now! â BETA TESTERS:We are looking for a few brave Beta testers to help us check out new features and improvements...If your up for it, Drop us a line at quicklaunch@conduit.com and don't forget to let us know what device you use (make and version).DEVICE SUPPORT:We are continually adding support for new devices. If you encounter any problems, please e-mail us and we will resolve and fix the problem as soon as possible.quicklaunch@conduit.comNOTES:About permissions:Please notice that Quick Launch requires a number of permissions, the purpose is to launch other Apps from the lockscreen, while we definitely won't read the contents in users' phone. For example, SMS read permission is required in order to display the missed messages, while we will not read any content of the SMS.Tags:Android locker,lock screen ,lockscreen, widget locker, theme,themable,keyguard,widget locker , magic, å®å éå±ï¼éå ,milocker,Lock 2.0,LockBot,GOTO Lockscreen,Go Locker

reviews.title: Almost what I was looking for...
reviews.comment: I was looking for a lock screen that would allow me to start Google Music without unlocking. This does that, except it\'s not really a lock screen. I need the ability to add PIN or gesture security. 5 star app as soon as that happens.
reviews.author: Matthew Howard

reviews.title: No more lag!
reviews.comment: Man I really like this lockscreen but it\'s freezing and has a huge lag. I still use because it has great features but needs work. Please update. Running 4.1.2 on Note 2  Update* after the new update its smooth and fast. The only thing still the search bar it\'s defaulted to Bing and you can\'t add more widgets. Overall getting better
reviews.author: Leo Nidas

reviews.title: Faster
reviews.comment: Very fast and steady on my note 2 Thanks to the dev
reviews.author: LIPYU S

reviews.title: Would get 5th star if...
reviews.comment: I love this lock screen it has everything Right there that yu need without unlocking.  But I would love to have the option to put some kind of lock on the phone . And to also be able to remove the notification bar.  If that could be possible then it would get the last star.
reviews.author: charity Hall-Johnson

reviews.title: Great but....
reviews.comment: This is a great app but I got stuck in a loop where I was stuck in the quick lock screen the stock lock screen and my text message app I fixed it but if it weren\'t for that I would give it 5 stars
reviews.author: Logan Davis

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is a really good app. I wasn\'t expecting much but I found it works great! And it is free! What more could you ask for. I really like having a widget on the lockscreen. And I found it is really fast without any lag. Highly recommend for a galaxy s3.
reviews.author: Arthur St.James

reviews.title: Almost prefect
reviews.comment: Needs to have the ability to actually lock it... Without that it defeats the purpose because I have to have a lock... too much personal info on my phone... you should be able to swipe through the widgets... Its a hassle pressing that button to toggle. Add the ability to add a picture for my theme and this is top 5 apps for me.
reviews.author: Jay Evans

reviews.comment: When i try to edit the lockscreen background and put other widget. Its freezing my o+ then i need to restart to ne able to use again.tnx conduit\tExecellent app! Good idea that you put social network site on lockscreen.. but when i try to put other widgets it my o+8.52 become freeze help.. tnx conduit
reviews.author: Ian Jasper Santos

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: No adverts, so slick and clean
reviews.author: Khumbo Mbeya

reviews.title: Great!!!
reviews.comment: Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.author: shane humphreys

reviews.title: Not so good.
reviews.comment: Can be much better !!
reviews.author: vasudev misra

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: first Locker that works 100 % ...an I\'ve tried them all but could be better - don\'t like the button to switch pages nor the bottom bar settings just make it a swipe pls and then some but still ...awesome thx
reviews.author: joe hartman

reviews.title: NEEDS UPDATE
reviews.comment: The app is great I would prefer to be able to change recent apps to the ones I use the most. Also the app crashes 7 out of 10 times I use it it NEEDS tu have an update to fix it
reviews.author: eduardo uranga

reviews.comment: great app. would give it 5 stars if the additional option buttons were able to be chosen and not auto the most recent... Also wish you change first screen like the other 2. Otherwise one of the best apps i\'ve seen!
reviews.author: Brandi Quesada

reviews.title: Htc One S 4.0.4
reviews.comment: This app is awesome. It never lags, looks clean and easy to set up. I love the social options and may the developer please include Tumblr into the list and and option to pick what apps i can quickly access from the lockscreen it self, other than that it\'s a solid 4 stars =)
reviews.author: David Cifuentes

reviews.title: Settings button error
reviews.comment: Clicking on settings on the lock screen and then clicking back button takes you to home instead of lock screen... And the recent apps should be user selectable..
reviews.author: Rohith Kotagiri

reviews.title: Good quality lock screen
reviews.comment: This is a great quality lock screen app, one of the best I\'ve encountered.  My only complaint is that I can\'t choose which apps I want to be my lock screen shortcuts.  This functionality should be added.  I would rate this app 5 stars if I could customize my lock screen shortcuts.  Otherwise, a solid app.
reviews.author: Cesar Cota

reviews.title: 2 search options!!??
reviews.comment: There are 2 options 1 at the top of the launch screen and the other when you slide the lock down.. I would like out if they could make a small widget placed at the top like maybe a torch light of something.. And also pre defined apps instead of recent apps would be nice.. Love the app.. Its my default Lock screen..
reviews.author: Theo Charles

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I\'d like to be able to add a few other widgets since I\'m not into all that social networking as I\'m sure others are the same.. but other than that its great and I prefer it over the default LS so I shouldnt really complain! :)
reviews.author: Kate Marie

reviews.title: more customisations...please!
reviews.comment: only 4 stars...will give 5 stars if the screen will be fully customizable. like deleting the search bar choosing your own apps and not only the recently used. and please delete the settings options when the lockscreen is actually enabled. other than that works fine, like it a lot.
reviews.author: Pierre Schmidt
